issue.title: [CI] Use https, verify signatures when communicating with msys2.org
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9571](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9571). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow up for: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7840

Not sure it's necessary, but we could be using `https://repo.msys2.org` instead of `http://repo.msys2.org` and/or verifying the signature for the keyring pkg
